previewArticle.title: Argentina vs. Bosnia and Herzegovina: 2014 World Cup | Group F Match Preview

matches.venue: S. Darius and S. Grienas Stadium

recapArticle.title: Argentina 2, Bosnia-Herzegovina 1: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group F Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: DylanMc
timelineItems.text: This should be a cracker. Dzeko has a great strike rate at international level #ARGvsBIH

timelineItems.name: Travis Bowland
timelineItems.text: What a side Argentina have on the team sheet. Still think dzeko will sneak one in tonight though! #WorldCup #ARGvsBIH

timelineItems.name: Soccer Gods
timelineItems.text: That is the first time–EVER–that Masch has responded to being dispossessed by committing a blatant foul. #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Pete Lamb
timelineItems.text: Messi and Aguero should only be allowed to shoot with their wrong foot like the quality kid at school. #TooGood #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: D Hills
timelineItems.text: Kolasinac being very clever scoring an early own goal. First team to concede wins in this World Cup #ARGvBIH #ArgentinaBosnia

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: If this World Cu has taught us anything, it's soccer fans should always arrive on time. 1-0 to the Argentina now. #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Dominic Centrone
timelineItems.text: Bosnia playing a very high pressing game. Shutting down quickly but how long can they sustain this intensity. #ARGvBIH #sbsworldgame

timelineItems.name: Luke Perrin
timelineItems.text: I know that I’m supposed to hate Argentina, being English and all, but I always seem to want them to do well. #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: ESPN
timelineItems.text: #BRASILxESPN Así formará #ARG en el debut por el Grupo F ante #BIH, en Río de Janeiro. http://t.co/SLXnNuR0RM

timelineItems.name: ESPN
timelineItems.text: #BRASILxESPN Así formará #ARG en el debut por el Grupo F ante #BIH, en Río de Janeiro. http://t.co/SLXnNuR0RM

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: #BIH Lineup: Begovic, Bicakcic, Spahic (c), Kolasinac, Besic, Pjanic, Misimovic, Dzeko, Mujdza, Lulic, Hajrovic #ARGvBIH #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Thehoselrocketeer
timelineItems.text: Argentina se alinean 5-3-2. No Higuaín o Lavezzi pero vencieron Bosnia y sin Messi utilizando este sistema. #ARGvBiH

timelineItems.name: Soccer Gods
timelineItems.text: Argentina fans "arrived in Rio on approximately 865 ships. Rowboats to be precise." #ARGvBIH http://t.co/1rfDkoGWnv

timelineItems.name: Rupesh
timelineItems.text: Though an early own goal happened. This match gonna be interesting,Regardless, I'm saying this #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Darryl Dioso
timelineItems.text: Wow. Excellent atmosphere. The stadium is in full voice. #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Thehoselrocketeer
timelineItems.text: World Cup has been superb entertainment so far but THIS is the game I've been waiting for! #ARGvBiH

timelineItems.name: Luke Lohr
timelineItems.text: All set to watch Lionel Messi and co show what they've got on the world stage. #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: Roberto Martinez is possibly my favorite soccer mind right now. I could listen to him talk all day long. #mancrush #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: DJFC
timelineItems.text: @fantasy_champ Normally I'd cheer a def set up against #ARG but going down on an og early they need to score for momentum #ARGvBIH #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Zvjezdan Misimovic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Javier Mascherano (Argentina).

timelineItems.name: Andrew McDonnell
timelineItems.text: #ARGvBIH should be an outstanding game, at the Maracana too #2014FIFAWorldCup

timelineItems.name: Semir Bajrektarevic
timelineItems.text: #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Miquel Jacobs
timelineItems.text: Will Messi perform like very other superstar (minus Rooney) has so far this World Cup? He IS the world's best player. #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Ujjwilicueta
timelineItems.text: @SkyFootball #ARGvsBIH #WorldCup Di Maria, because he is the man for big occasions, small occasion too, almost every occasion

timelineItems.name: Igor Marinovic
timelineItems.text: I remember 24 years ago when Argentina lost opener vs outsider and went all the way to finals. Let the history be repeated! #ARGvsBIH

timelineItems.name: Danny Carlyle
timelineItems.text: The 'want' to see messi score loads tonight is turned when you listen to Bosnia's story and how far they have come! #WorldCup2014 #ARGvsBIH

timelineItems.name: Dr. No Fun
timelineItems.text: Haha, "I don't care about tomorrow, I want to see #Messi now." Don't ask your #ARG analyst about #USA until after the #ARGvsBIH game @espn

timelineItems.name: Caleb Childers
timelineItems.text: #ARGvsBIH prediction: 2-1 Argentina wins in a clincher. Several yellow cards. Expect Messi to make an assist but no goal. #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Daz McNally
timelineItems.text: Gonna be tough getting up at 5:45 for work in the morning, but I'm not missing this game. #ARGvsBIH

timelineItems.name: Josh Farrar
timelineItems.text: Di Maria most improved attacking player in the world this year with Madrid. Can see him bagging plenty in Brazil #ARGvsBIH #bbcworldcup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Miralem Pjanic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Davin Lassiter
timelineItems.text: Argentine defenders were marveling at how good a ball that was, I guess #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.comment: Muhamed Besic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ángel Di María (Argentina).

timelineItems.name: エクスナア
timelineItems.text: 13' #BIH made a nice few plays there before the foul. With a free kick here... #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: D Riddick-McGregor
timelineItems.text: Bos-Hertz aren't perfect, but they're giving a pretty good account of themselves (apart from the own goal...) #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Matt Oswin
timelineItems.text: What happens if the ref runs out of spray? #WorldCup #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Edin Dzeko (Bosnia and Herzegovina).
Hugo Campagnaro (Argentina) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Football Tips
timelineItems.text: Argentina v Bosnia-Hercegovina on the way next. Let's hear your score predictions _______________ #ARGvsBIH

timelineItems.name: Myless
timelineItems.text: Can't wait for this game tbh, with the attack of Argentina we would be in for some good football! #ARGvsBIH

timelineItems.name: Sam Clarke
timelineItems.text: Bosnia also have players who can feed Dzeko is the midfield, the likes of Lulic and Pjanic are top quality players #ARGvsBIH

timelineItems.name: Marc Wearne
timelineItems.text: Don't care about Messi, I just wanna see if #ARG live up to the pre tournament hype!! #ARGvsBIH #WorldCup #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Cullen Roche
timelineItems.text: Brazil did such a good job on that field! #ARGvsBIH

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Así alinea Bosnia: Begovic; Bicakcic, Spahic, Kolasinac, Besic, Pjanic, Misimovic, Dzeko, Mujdza, Lulic y Hajrovic #ARGvsBIH #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: James Travis
timelineItems.text: Here we go then, players coming out #ARGvsBIH #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Así alinea Argentina: Romero; Garay, Campagnaro, Zabaleta, Di María, Messi, Rodríguez, Mascherano, Rojo, Fernández y Agüero #ARGvsBIH

timelineItems.name: SSBdotcom
timelineItems.text: It must feel like a home game for Argentina! #ARGvsBIH #Brasil2014

timelineItems.name: Mwaf's Personal View
timelineItems.text: Started supporting #ARG during Caniggia and Maradona's time. Time for Messi and Di Maria to shine #ARGvsBIH

timelineItems.name: Karl Rushton
timelineItems.text: Genuinely excited about this game. With the exception of NEDvESP this is the pick of the first games. And in the Maracana. Oof. #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Bhavdeep S. Chadha
timelineItems.text: Surreal entry for Argentina and Bosnia-Herzegovina in the Rio Stadium. #ARGvsBIH and my Man #Messi. #FIFAWorldCup

timelineItems.name: MagnoliaPeach
timelineItems.text: Uh, is the Bosnian team full of giants?!? I can't be the only one to notice how much bigger they look, right?! #WorldCup2014 #ARGvsBIH

timelineItems.name: Chris Goodacre
timelineItems.text: Looking forward to this, gonna go 3-1 Argentina, Aguero to bag a couple #ARGvsBIH

timelineItems.name: ken
timelineItems.text: #BIH are giving #ARG a run for there money,pjanic stands over the ball but it hits the wall #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: 15': #Argentina has the lead, but #BosniaHerzegovina have settled down trying to grab an equalizer. 1-0 #ARG. #ARGvBIH #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Robbie Farrell
timelineItems.text: I'm really looking forward to this game. #Aguero, Di Maria and, of course, #Messi, are hopefully going to blitz this #WorldCup. #ARGvsBIH

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Izet Hajrovic (Bosnia and Herzegovina).

timelineItems.name: Thehoselrocketeer
timelineItems.text: Not so much 5-3-2 as 3-5-2 as #ARG look to kill this early. Risky, #BIH have enough to expose this. #ARGvBiH

timelineItems.name: ken
timelineItems.text: That tag team on @LeoMessi1987 is quite interesting. Whenever he gets the ball he is bundled by 2 #BIH players #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Sergio Agüero (Argentina) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Marcos Rojo.

timelineItems.name: Maanisaad Shahriar
timelineItems.text: So far, Messi has more play time in ads than actual play.. #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Greg
timelineItems.text: This #BBC commentator sounds like it's Bronn from #GameOfThrones speaking haha, absolutely uncanny! #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: ken
timelineItems.text: @LeoMessi1987 has been well handled today but never count out such a world class player,he can pop up with the right goods #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: You can just see for #ARG that #Messi is more concerned about laying off his teammates...shouldn't be afraid to shoot really #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Phil Sigg
timelineItems.text: Don't count out Bosnia & Herzegovina, they've got some great talent in their squad #worldcup2014 #ARGvsBIH

timelineItems.comment: Sergio Agüero (Argentina) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Mensur Mujdza (Bosnia and Herzegovina).

timelineItems.name: Dusty Pittman
timelineItems.text: I like Argentina and Messi but I'm kinda pulling for the underdogs Bosnia-Herzegovina in this one #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Wasted Rio
timelineItems.text: I told @BoringMilner that Di Maria was actually an Angel. He thought I said angle, and was being obtuse. #ArgvBIH #bbcworldcup

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Argentina 2, Bosnia and Herzegovina 1.

timelineItems.name: Ad
timelineItems.text: #FullTime Argentina 2 (Kolasinac 3 [own goal], Messi 65) Bosnia 1 (Ibisevic 84) FIFA World Cup 2014 #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Gilly
timelineItems.text: Very impressive game from #BIH despite the result #ARGvBIH #worldcup

timelineItems.name: Soccer Gods
timelineItems.text: The #WorldCup of Messi begins with 3 points. Just as scripted. Sorry, Dragons. #ARGvBIH http://t.co/1rfDkoGWnv

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: 37 goals scored thus far at the #WorldCup, most through 11 World Cup games since 1958.

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Argentina 2-1 Bosnia-Herzegovina: Golazo de Lionel Messi desató toda una fiesta albiceleste en el Maracaná http://t.co/qoTNIjNFN6 #ARGvsBIH

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Thomas Müller has seven goals in seven career #WorldCup games. And he's 24.

timelineItems.desc: Check out the highlights from Argentina and Bosnia-Herzegovina in World Cup still photos.
timelineItems.title: World Cup in Pictures: Lionel Messi goal earns 3 points for Argentina over Bosnia-Herzegovina

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Five Aside's recap of today's #WorldCup games includes Messi, Benzema & World Cup records: http://t.co/fnWj4tnHDJ

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 10 - Spain have allowed the most shots on target against them so far at the #WorldCup. Battered.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Thomas Müller scores Germany's first #WorldCup hat trick since Miroslav Klose in 2002.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Germany is the first country to score at least four goals in four straight #WorldCup openers.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 4 - Portugal have conceded four goals in a #WorldCup game for the first time in their history (24 games). Mullered. #POR

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Germany has won seven straight #WorldCup openers by a combined score of 27-3.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Portugal loses 4-0 to Germany, the worst loss in Portugal's #WorldCup history.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: No draws in 12 opening World Cup games this year. First time that's happened since the first #WorldCup in 1930.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 3.14 - The average goals per game of the 2014 #WorldCup is higher than any tournament since the 1958 edition. Entertainment.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Final: Iran 0, Nigeria 0. First draw of the 2014 #WorldCup.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage: BEL-ALG: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN BRA-MEX: 2:30 ET, ESPN RUS-KOR: 5:30 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 9 - The top scoring squad number at the last five #WorldCup finals is number 9. Traditional.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 5 - #ALG have failed to score in their last 5 #WorldCup games & have had 71 shots since their last goal in 1986. Barrier.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Tim Howard led #USMNT with 33 touches in the first half. #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: FIFA officially clocks Clint Dempsey's goal at 34 seconds, the 6th-fastest goal in #WorldCup history.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: FIFA now clocks Clint Dempsey's goal at 30 seconds, still the 5th-fastest goal in #WorldCup history.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: 21-year-old John Brooks is the youngest American to score a #WorldCup goal since Landon Donovan in 2002.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Algeria leads at halftime for the second time at the #WorldCup, first since 1982 vs Chile (Algeria won 3-2).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: #USMNT made 45 clearances against Ghana, most by any team in a #WorldCup game since 1966 (our whole data set).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: FIFA now says Clint Dempsey's goal came 29 seconds in, making it the 5th-fastest goal in #WorldCup history.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Belgium is the 6th team to win after conceding 1st at this #WorldCup. It happened 3 times in the entire 2010 WC.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: There have been three scoreless first halves at this #WorldCup. Mexico has played two of them.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 13% - A higher % of goals have been scored at 2014 #WorldCup than any other finals - 1978 12%, 1994 11%, 1990 11%, 1998 10%. Spot @MacRob85

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 13% - A higher % of goals have been scored from penalties at 2014 #WorldCup than any other finals - 78 12%, 94 11%, 90 11%. Spot @MacRob85

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Busy #WorldCup day ahead: Netherlands & Chile could advance. Spain (!) is 1 of 4 teams that could be eliminated.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Brazil had been 17-0-0 at the #WorldCup vs non-UEFA/CONMEBOL teams, outscoring them 50-5.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage: AUS-NED: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN ESP-CHI, 2:30 ET, ESPN CMR-CRO, 5:30 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 14 - Miroslav Klose needs one goal to equal Ronaldo's record for the most goals (15) at #WorldCup finals. Target. https://t.co/shzx51qSGq

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Five Aside's recap of yesterday's #WorldCup action. Messi, Benzema, late winners: http://t.co/ZqWU1NZZ9t

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Exciting #WorldCup so far. 10 of 11 games have had 3+ goals, & only one half hasn't had a goal (MEX-CMR 1st).

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 7 - Arjen Robben has scored seven goals in his last seven appearances for #NED. Threat. #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 11 - #NED are unbeaten in their last 11 #WorldCup group stage matches, winning eight and drawing three. Juggernaut.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage: GER-POR; 11:30 AM ET, ESPN IRN-NGA: 2:30 ET, ESPN GHA-USA: 5:30 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Tim Cahill has five career #WorldCup goals. All other Australians have a total of five.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: 49 goals so far at the World Cup, most through 17 #WorldCup games since 1958.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 99 – Tonight will be Germany’s 100th game at the #WorldCup finals. Landmark.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Arjen Robben now has six career #WorldCup goals. Johnny Rep is the only Dutchman with more (7).

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 206 - #GER have scored 206 goals and conceded 117 in their previous 99 #WorldCup matches. Routine.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 1938 – The last time Germany did not make the Last 8 of a #WorldCup finals that they entered. Consistent.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 37 - #GER have kept 37 clean sheets at the #WorldCup finals – only #BRA (42) have kept more. Sweeper.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 25 – Lothar Matthäus has made more appearances than any other player at the #WorldCup finals. Marauding.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 14 – Miroslav Klose and Gerd Müller are the joint-top scorers for Germany at the #WorldCup finals. Bomber.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 4 - #GER have won all four penalty shoot outs in #WorldCup finals. Reputation

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Germany-Portugal kicks off the day. Germany will be the first country to play 100 #WorldCup games.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Portugal is 1-8-0 when conceding first at #WorldCup. Only win: 1966 vs North Korea (after trailing 3-0).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Germany has converted 11 of 13 #WorldCup penalties. Only Spain has scored more (15 of 17).

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 13 - Only #ESP (17) have won more penalties at the #WorldCup finals than #GER. Spot.

timelineItems.name: Ray Webster
timelineItems.text: Messi is being muscled out of it so far. Very impressed by Bosnia. #worldcup #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Argentina) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Javier Mascherano.

timelineItems.name: José_Ranjo
timelineItems.text: @Heiracci Messi is looking like a third division player out there. Nothing constructive from him yet 19' #ARGvBIH #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: ken
timelineItems.text: @LeoMessi1987 will soon get frustrated,those guys have done there homework on.the lad #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Soccer Gods
timelineItems.text: Stereotypes are holding so far. #ARG is short & wiggly. #BIH is big & tackly. #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Matt Oswin
timelineItems.text: Messi losing his touch; only took three to tackle him #WorldCup #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Luke Lohr
timelineItems.text: Messi why didn't you dribble those three guys that were hounding you? Get it together and be the Jedi. #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Ethan Tam
timelineItems.text: I highly doubt this game will be decided by just an own goal to the benefit of Argentina. #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Jay K
timelineItems.text: at this rate Bosnia gonna retake the goal they gave away....I want em too #WC2014 #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Nico Aaron Ugbaja
timelineItems.text: That classic problem of no matter how good you are if your teammates are rubbish you cannot do anything ##ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: Rule #1 of #WorldCup2014: Do not score first. Do you think Bosnia committed the OG on purpose?? #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: ken
timelineItems.text: That was hard for Kolasinic. First time at the #WorldCup2014 and you score an own goal #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Senad Lulic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Edin Dzeko with a headed pass.
Mensur Mujdza (Bosnia and Herzegovina) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Marcos Rojo (Argentina).

timelineItems.name: Andy Ballard
timelineItems.text: For the best player in the world #Messi sure as hell walks a lot. #WorldCup #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: herculez gomez
timelineItems.text: I get that Bosnia is a possession team, but I don’t understand why they’re so lax/careless with the ball in the back. #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: The #Messi haters are out already? It's been 25 minutes and he's seen the ball no more than three times..65min left, relax lol #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Chaka Simbeye
timelineItems.text: Pjanic passing from deep could really cause problems for Argentina tonight. Lulic, Dzeko, Hajrovic and Misimovic need to work. #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: ken
timelineItems.text: Dangerous ball into the #ARG box and the #BIH are having a great spell of possession #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Craig Daniels
timelineItems.text: Giant Gonzalez resurrected & playing at left-back for Bosnia #ARGvBIH #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Thehoselrocketeer
timelineItems.text: ..and in that moment, Rojo demonstrates why some pundits have concerns about the left side of the #ARG defence. #ARGvBiH

timelineItems.comment: Miralem Pjanic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sergio Agüero (Argentina).
Offside, Bosnia and Herzegovina. Izet Hajrovic tries a through ball, but Senad Lulic is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: The Black Jesus
timelineItems.text: Argentina is the oldest team at this tournament (average age 28.57 years) #ARGvsBIH #worldcup #ssfootball

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Mensur Mujdza (Bosnia and Herzegovina).
Marcos Rojo (Argentina) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Marcos Rojo (Argentina) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Lionel Messi with a cross following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: Have to admire the comfortable nature with with #BIH possess the ball with...they're very self assured...don't write them off... #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: ken
timelineItems.text: From the early exchanges I think #BIH have been the better team by far and have had the better chances #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: bar90
timelineItems.text: Im a little confused with #Rojo at wingback... Seems way too slow. Just us?? #bar90 #CrispyQuest #WorldCup #WC2014 #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Maxi Rodríguez (Argentina) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Lionel Messi.
Attempt saved. Javier Mascherano (Argentina) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: amresendez
timelineItems.text: Bosnia grinds out 1-0 wins left and right. This game is no surprise so far. OG just ruined the clean sheet #ARGvBIH

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schorr
timelineItems.text: #ARGvsBIH ARG have the pieces but they can't seem to get a rhythm going. BIH is doing a great job taking away space and holding their ground

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Edin Dzeko (Bosnia and Herzegovina) left footed shot from outside the box is too high.

timelineItems.name: Iheanyi Smart
timelineItems.text: The pace in this game #ARGvsBIH , hmm, #SuperEagles should be technically sound to play every opponent in dis group. #WorldCup #Brazil2014

timelineItems.name: Brian Barrish
timelineItems.text: 32' Mascharano with a laser but right at Begovic, who had to parry that straight out. #ARGvsBIH #Brazil2014

timelineItems.name: Matchbook Exchange
timelineItems.text: Bosnia are threatening here. Could they get the draw here? It's at 8.0. Argentina struggling to create chances #ARGvsBIH

timelineItems.comment: Hugo Campagnaro (Argentina) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Miralem Pjanic (Bosnia and Herzegovina).

timelineItems.name: Ahmed M. Jaafar
